record.id: field.name="agreement.id" and file.name="incidents" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: agreement.id
record.file.name: incidents

brief.brief: The unique ID of the Service Level Agreement (SLA) associated to the Interaction.

detail.detail: Service Manager uses this number to track relationships between SLAs and their supporting data.

When registering an Interaction, you can manually select the SLA. If you leave this field blank, Service Manager will use a selection process to populate the SLA based on information from the customer's data record.
This field becomes read-only after the Interaction has been registered.
